thread.title: Vitamin D, xanthohumol may offer new approach to obesity epidemic (Oregon State University)
thread.title_full: Vitamin D, xanthohumol may offer new approach to obesity epidemic (Oregon State University) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Vitamin D, xanthohumol may offer new approach to obesity epidemic (Oregon State University)
text: ( Source : Oregon State University ) CORVALLIS, Ore. - A growing body of evidence suggests that two natural compounds, vitamin D and xanthohumol, have the ability to address imbalances in gut microbiota that may set the stage for obesity and
